references: P. Hagis, Jr., Unitary amicable numbers, Math. Comp., 25 (1971), 915-918.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).

J. M. Pedersen, Known Unitary Amicable Pairs
J. O. M. Pedersen, Tables of Aliquot Cycles
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Unitary Amicable Pair
mathematica: uDivisors[n_] := Select[Divisors[n], # < n && GCD[#, n/#] == 1 & ]; mate[n_] := If[m = Total[uDivisors[n]]; n == Total[uDivisors[m]], m, 0]; Reap[Do[If[n < (m = mate[n]), Print[m]; Sow[m]], {n, 2, 2000000}]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Jun 12 2012 *)
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_; extended Nov 24 2005
